tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE defective_items ( 
  id INT, 
  item_name VARCHAR(50), 
  department VARCHAR(50), 
  defect_description TEXT, 
  repair_cost DECIMAL 
);

CREATE TABLE repair_history ( 
  repair_id INT, 
  item_id INT, 
  repair_date DATE, 
  repair_description TEXT, 
  repair_engineer VARCHAR(50) 
);

CREATE TABLE DefectiveItems (
  item_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  item_name STRING,
  defect_description STRING,
  repair_option STRING
)

CREATE TABLE RepairHistory (
  repair_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  item_id UUID,
  repair_date TIMESTAMP,
  repair_details STRING
)

CREATE TABLE DisposalLog (
  disposal_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  item_id UUID,
  disposal_date TIMESTAMP,
  disposal_reason STRING
)

CREATE TABLE repair_records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    item_id INT,
    repair_date DATE,
    repair_description TEXT,
    technician_name VARCHAR(255),
    CONSTRAINT fk_item_id FOREIGN KEY (item_id) REFERENCES defective_items(item_id)
);

CREATE TABLE disposal_records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    item_id INT,
    disposal_date DATE,
    disposal_reason TEXT,
    disposal_method VARCHAR(255),
    CONSTRAINT fk_item_id FOREIGN KEY (item_id) REFERENCES defective_items(item_id)
);

CREATE TABLE DefectiveItems (
    id SERIAL,
    item_name VARCHAR(255),
    defect_description TEXT,
    repair_cost DECIMAL,
    disposal_decision VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE RepairHistory (
    history_id SERIAL,
    item_id INTEGER,
    repair_date DATE,
    repair_cost DECIMAL,
    repaired_by VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE DisposalLog (
    log_id SERIAL,
    item_id INTEGER,
    disposal_date DATE,
    disposal_method VARCHAR(100),
    disposed_by VARCHAR(100)
);
